To run the day-to-day operations of the assigned kitchen section together with the CDP

Prepare in advance food, beverages, materials, and equipment needed for the service. Cook and serve dishes according to the restaurantâ€™s menu

Required to have good English when it comes to understanding, speaking, and writing.
